name: Introduction to Art History
description: This course is an introduction to the history of art, its major movements, and its relationship to various world cultures.

name: The History of Western Art
description: This course examines the history of Western art from the Renaissance to the present day.

name: Modern Art
description: This course explores the major movements of modern art from the 19th to the 21st centuries.

name: Contemporary Art
description: This course explores the major movements and trends of contemporary art from the late 20th century to the present day.
